lead_paragraph: Financial institutions that repaid billions of dollars in federal aid can award unlimited bonuses, and thereby, also increase their tax deductions.
snippet: Financial institutions that repaid billions of dollars in federal aid can award unlimited bonuses, and thereby, also increase their tax deductions.

headline.main: With Bigger Bonuses, Another Upside for Banks
headline.seo: Banks Awarding Big Bonuses Benefit From Larger Tax Breaks
headline.print_headline: With Bigger Bonuses, an Upside for Banks
